${ModID}:SelloutQuest.TITLE: Sellout
${ModID}:SelloutQuest.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, add #b1 #yAdvertisement to your deck. Remove the #yAdvertisement from your deck to complete the quest.
${ModID}:SelloutQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games

${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.TITLE: Ceaseless Hunger
${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, obtain #yN'loth's #yFace [REMOVE_SPACE]. Obtain another #yN'loth's #yFace at the start of Act 2. Open a chest in Act 3 to complete this Quest.
${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games
${ModID}:CeaselessHungerQuest.REWARD: Remove all #yN'loth's #yFaces and obtain #b2 random #yRelics for each #yN'loth's #yFace removed.

${ModID}:EvilSentryQuest.TITLE: Evil Sentries
${ModID}:EvilSentryQuest.DESCRIPTION: Your next Elite this act will be three Sentries. In addition to their normal actions, they can also perform a special action (Deal #b5 damage and apply #b1 Draw Reduction). Defeat them.
${ModID}:EvilSentryQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games

${ModID}:WindowShoppingQuest.TITLE: Window Shopping
${ModID}:WindowShoppingQuest.DESCRIPTION: Leave #b2 shops without spending Gold in any of them.
${ModID}:WindowShoppingQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games

${ModID}:ThatsSmoresQuest.TITLE: That's S'Mores
${ModID}:ThatsSmoresQuest.DESCRIPTION: You can now roast marshmallows at Rest Sites. Do this #b2 times.
${ModID}:ThatsSmoresQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games

${ModID}:CharityQuest.TITLE: Charity Case
${ModID}:CharityQuest.DESCRIPTION: Any Gold reward you skip will be donated to The Cleric. This Quest ends when you gain any Gold, or if you obtain #yEctoplasm [REMOVE_SPACE].
${ModID}:CharityQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games
${ModID}:CharityQuest.REWARD: The Cleric thanks you! He will grant #b1 Max HP for every #b15 Gold donated.

${ModID}:BloomerQuest.TITLE: Okay, Bloomer
${ModID}:BloomerQuest.DESCRIPTION: Upon pickup, obtain a #yQuestbound #yMark #yof #ythe #yBloom [REMOVE_SPACE]. Climb #b10 floors with it.
${ModID}:BloomerQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games

${ModID}:HashtagBlessedQuest.TITLE: #Blessed
${ModID}:HashtagBlessedQuest.DESCRIPTION: At the start of each combat, a random, non-minion enemy will be blessed with a random buff. Defeat the Act 2 Boss.
${ModID}:HashtagBlessedQuest.AUTHOR: RamChops Games
